pages.text: It almost seems like a fever dream that you could strike with weapons faster than you can think. In the meantime, every blow costs you so much strength that you have to pause for a moment.\Maybe you are getting old.\\With a few small tweaks to your weapon, you can reduce this downtime somewhat.

pages.title: Characteristics
pages.text: Decreases attack cooldown.\\Max Level: 2\Applicable to melee weapons.

pages.title: Enchanter Recipe
pages.text: You can infuse a [#](bb00bb)common Book[#]() with Tight Grip by surrounding your $(l:enchanting/enchanter)Enchanter$() with $(l:general/pigment)Pigment$() and the other required materials.

pages.title: Enchantment Upgrading
pages.text: Upgrading Tight Grip from level 1 to level 2 is fairly cheap at first.\This price will quickly increase to more and more $(l:general/pigment)Pigment$() and experience for each additional level.
